text: The Paris-Panthéon-Assas University is a French university located in Paris founded in 1971.Panthéon-Assas University (Paris 2) The university mainly provides courses in law. Ranked in the top 150 of the best law universities in the world in the highly reputable QS World University Rankings in 2024, it is also one of the best universities in the country.Universite Paris-Pantheon- Assas == Famous former students == * Pierre Danon, a French entrepreneur * Éric Woerth, a French politician ==References== ==Other websites== * Paris- Panthéon-Assas University, official web site Category:1971 establishments in France Category:Universities in Paris
title: Paris-Panthéon-Assas University
